ActJudges Act
SubjectDallis Locke ** ANNUITY ** The Hon. Hugh R. Locke **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to DALLIS LOCKE, survivor of the Hon. Hugh R. Locke, a Judge of the Superior Court of Justice in and for the Province of Ontario, effective September 26, 2017.
AttachmentsAttachment
